website_summaries.verdict: Highly concentrated for wheel cleaning and protection. Great results.
pros: Minimal runoff for maximum cleaning power
Cleans winter salt and grime effectively
Safe on all wheels and tires
Acid free, nontoxic, and pH balanced

customer_reviews.title: There should be a better disclaimer for this
customer_reviews.text: There should be a better disclaimer for this. I used on my first wheel, no problem worked well after agitating and scrubbing...however normal soap with slight degreaser would have worked about the same. My problem came when using on my other wheels where the clear coat apparently was coming off and I didn't notice it. The acid in this solution cause the unprotected wheel parts to turn black and cloudy. Not really the products fault I guess since that is a big no no anyway, but don't say it's great for all types of wheels when it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Linscott

customer_reviews.title: This just might the "Best" wheel cleaner I've used to date.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different wheel cleaners before and this one is really great. I was excited to try this on my wheels today even though it was raining lol. I haven't cleaned my wheels in at least a month and I'm happy to say that this wheel cleaner is the best one I've used so far. I might have used a bit more than I needed but no harm. Do use a wheel brush though if you have more than ordinary dirt and dust build up. No wheel cleaner can get rid of brake dust alone not even the really expensive ones. Good job carguys.
customer_reviews.author: John Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work. I only had about a week’s worth of break dust, but this product didn’t do any more than a spritz of water would have done. Except for staining my driveway red. 👎
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Best Tire and Wheel Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I've used various brands of wheel cleaner over the years with mixed but never great results. This product was recommended by a friend and I was skeptical. It's a bit more expensive than some of the other products but the results are well worth the investment. Unlike cheap wheel cleaner that runs off almost immediately, Car Guys Wheel and Tire Cleaner adheres to the tire and wheel allowing the product to dissolve the dirt and grime. As an added bonus the product is Made in the USA, Environmentally Responsible, Works Great AND comes with a 100% SATISFACTION MONEY BACK GUARANTEE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lyle N.

customer_reviews.title: Best Wheel Cleaner I've Found
customer_reviews.text: I recently inherited a Harley Davidson Sportster that had been badly neglected. The rear wheel was literally black with brake dust and grime. I tried some old wheel cleaner on my shelf, and it didn't touch the mess. I read reviews of this product, and decided to try it. OMG, I sprayed it on, massaged it gently with a spoke brush, let stand for five minutes, and sprayed off with water. My wheel looks brand new. It doesn't even need a second application. I will be ordering more of this stuff for my garage. What a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bos

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, pretty disappointing. Comparing to poorboy's world spray and rinse, i'd consider this about half as effective, and about half of the usage. The bottle goes fast and still leaves the wheels dirty. I think i only got about 3 car washes in with this product. My wheels are left streaky and brake dust clumps left still. Overall would not recommenced or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: N. Baines

customer_reviews.title: Works but buyer beware *discolored dipped wheels*
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned the wheel but it also discolored my gloss black plasti dipped wheels. They went from black to a dark grey. It did however clean the wheels lol The last picture is how they were before my wheels got dirty. I also wrapped the car 3 weeks later which is why the car is black in one picture and the grey in another.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed..... nothing special. Still had to wipe of light wheel dust at the end. I had high hopes after using car guys super cleaner on the interior
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: So im an extreme car guy. I take pride in my vehicles, currently my 2016 Denali 2500. The wheels have some brake residue I can't get off. After trying this wheel and tire cleaner, ive found that it will clean the tires no problem, but will not touch the brake grime. Ive followed the directions and am very dissatisfied. It left marks on the chrome, and now they look even worse.
customer_reviews.author: Tr

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: What a complete waste of money! The product doesn't work any better than the bucket of auto soap and water that I use to wash my cars. Still have to use a brush and elbow grease. The worst part is it says to "use sparingly - a little goes a long way". Yeah right, I used 1/3 of the bottle cleaning two sets of wheels. So basically just enough to wash your wheels 6 times. That's quite expensive! Definitely would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Works no better than soap and water
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worthless. Works no better than soap and water. If you have brake dust stuck to the wheel for a while, it will not remove it. Period.
customer_reviews.author: dxg

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: My truck rims had lots of road grime which a tire brush, soap and other cleaning products did not remove. I thought I would give this product a try after reading reviews and auto blogs . After the first application, I could see so much improvement. A second application and some light scrubbing with a wire brush was all that was needed to get the grime off. I am impressed with this product. Please, seriously consider adding this item to your car cleaning supplies.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with this product for the $15 price
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this product for the $15 price. I went to autozone/O'Reilly and bout a tire cleaner product for $5 after purchasing this. The $5 product did the same job this product did. However for $5 I could of bought 3 for the price of this. And trust me that counts because this stuff goes fast. And if your wheels really need love one bottle is not enough.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me..
customer_reviews.text: Lots of good review here, but it simply didn't work for me. I bought a used car that has lots of dirt and dust on the steel rims. Followed the instructions and went through the process twice. It did make them a little better, but I simply couldn't get much of the brown dust off the rims. In the end, what really worked with was using kitchen foil paper and scrub the dust off. Honestly, I was hoping for better results as this stuff is quite expensive.
customer_reviews.author: D. Weng

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to built up brake dust
customer_reviews.text: what's the one part of our vehicle that we hate to clean?...the tires and the wheels. All that brake dust just doesn't come off easily with our soap and water car wash solution, and when you scrub, it's like you've created a slime monster that is hard to get rid of. A few weeks ago, I ordered CarGuys Wheel and Tire Cleaner to see if it would make the job any less painful. I followed their directions (hard for a guy to do, right?), and "voila"!, the rims look fantastic! So easy to apply, and easy to scrub and rinse off. I'll be ordering this again when (no, before) I run out. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's pink...whoopee
customer_reviews.text: Used as directed. Barely removed anything. Tried it on a set of new wheels and tires with less than 1000 miles on them. Not much dirt or brake dust, just enough to notice a little bit. Product did not do too much, would still have to use soft sponge or microfiber to manually wash. Maybe other have had better results? I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: My expectations were too high...
customer_reviews.text: I really thought for the cost this product would do more of the 'work' for me. Item sprays on easily, but your forearm may get tired after spraying 40-50 pumps... Product is a good cleaner and does wash off easily. I found that about the same amount of scrubbing/rubbing was needed with this product as soap or car wash concentrate. I was hoping to spray on, and use a pressured hose to spray off 95% of the dirt & grime. This wasn't my experience. Will most likely revert to soap and brush moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: T. B.

customer_reviews.title: Really good but not perfect... 4.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple Wallymart products and totally wasted my money. Tried this product and it’s what I would expect... easy to apply and it’s really effective... it broke through baked in brake dust better than the other products. But still not perfect... there were remnants left after two applications and a lot of brushing. After 2 light sprayings on four wheels there isn't much left, which makes it a bit on the expensive side. But it's the most effective thing I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Bigh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Results in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I've been recently getting into a habit of washing my car every weekend for the past few weeks. My Honda Insight had dirt and other things caked on the rims from over 3 years ago. I tried using soap and a pressure washer but it didn't help. 5 minutes after using this and using the pressure washer it just came off without any issue. I know I missed a few spots on my first attempt but I now know I just got to go over them again with the cleaner and wash them off and they'll be just as good as the day I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: best wheel cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wheel and tire cleaner I have ever used. I am a detail freak with my automobiles and I have tried many products out there for cleaning wheels and tires. This stuff by far is the best I have used. It cleans the wheels and raised white letters on my tires better than any product I have tried. I highly recommend this product to everyone who is the same way I am about the appearance of their cars!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L.

customer_reviews.title: Undecided
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many products from this supplier. All the other product I would give a 4 to 5 rating. This product does not seem to have superior cleaning capabilities to the wheel cleaners purchased off the shelf at Autozone or Walmart. I can see possibly an advantage in buying in bulk. I have expensive wheels on both of my Nissan Titan Pro 4Xs and try to maintain them so I have used quite a bit of this product and I would only give ave to good. I would probably try another wheel cleaner before I re-purchased this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike LaRosa

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to use some elbow grease
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that cleaning my wheels will be easier with this product but its basically like spraying pink dishwashing detergent. I thought it was gonna soften the brake dust and grime so you can just wipe it and hose it off. You still need to use the same amount of force with your wheel brush to clean. UPDATE: Car Guys customer service reached out even before I wrote the review to check in on me. I can tell that these guys are passionate about their products and care about my user experience. Even though not completely positive, they still worked with me and gave me a refund. This is what customer service is all about.
customer_reviews.author: Lambo

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous
customer_reviews.text: The wheels on my old car were in bad shape, with 10 years build up of brake dust, grease and grime. I tried a competing highly rated product and saw mediocre results. I decided the wheels were left in bad shape for too long and maybe nothing was going to get them clean. Finally decided to give it one more try. This product is miraculous! One application and a little agitation from a wheel cleaning brush and voila, my wheels look good as new! Great product, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: 80s Kid

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for wheel cleaning. Led to believe from the other reviews it was an excellent product. It works no better than the other wheel cleaners on the market that are less expensive. Used on multiple types of wheels with the same average results as other cleaners. Had to use brush and a lot of elbow grease to get the wheels moderately clean and still had brake dust that the cleaner did not address. Ceramic brake pads, standard brake pads - it didn't matter what type of brake dust was or the wheel type - the results were not impressive.
customer_reviews.author: KAK

customer_reviews.title: Zero improvement
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to this with the high reviews. I followed the instructions and waited for it to work. This product did not clean the wheel whatsoever. I've had better luck spraying water on my wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say after using this the first time I didnt think it was anything special. Sprayed it on hosed it off and it got most of the brake dust and grime off but it was after I used this product the second time I realized just how dirty my rims really were! My complete Brembo brake assembly was spotless! the dust around the lug nuts gone! rims are like new again! I would suggest after spraying it on and leaving it for a few minutes follow up with a sponge, soap and water for a great cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: John Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: This stuff eats up grime
customer_reviews.text: This stuff took caked on brake dust and rust off my painted wheels, and the chrome accents of my wheels with relative ease. I'd recommend it to anyone that needs their super dirty wheels cleaned. The only thing I noticed is that if your wheels have any plastic parts, it can leave wet spot looking residue and smears. It'll also pull chrome plating off plastic bits. But for use on metal wheels, painted or unpainted, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: “Spray on and then lightly agitate wheels with brush or sponge”. ??? Simple Green does the job just fine if there has to be manual labor involved. Can’t. see why I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Not the 'best' ive used but works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: What I was hoping for was a wheel cleaning product that binds to and lifts brake dust, so it can be washed away with my electric power washer. That is not what this product does, but with a little bit of scrubbing very good results can be achieved. I used a Mothers wheel brush with soft bristles and was able to lift even the decade old dust on the inside of the wheel. In the past I have used the unpleasant smelling acid based wheel cleaners and they are easier to use, but I am still pleased with the results I got from this cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Trusty Rombone

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to use on my RAM 3500 Dually ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my RAM 3500 Dually aluminum wheels to get the brake dust off. Well, after trying 2 times, using a scrub brush and a Scotch-Brite Non Scratch sponge, it took a very little off. So, didn't work very well at all. UPDATE: Did some checking and found that the dust is burned into the clear coat and no one has really come up with a way to clean it off except with rubbing compound, which takes off the clearcoat. I did use this product on my car, and all the dust came right off of the rims and tires. So I am changing my original 2 stars to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes more work than it saves.
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell all this stuff does is dry on your wheels and make it another layer harder to get them clean. They like to disparage the other products that magically change color. Whatever, I'm switching back. I'm tried both multiple times on two older BMWs, a classic Porsche and a 97 Land Cruiser. So, my semi-professional opinion is given the choice, just use concentrated car wash over this. Picture shows product dried to an X5 wheel basically in the time it took to suds up the rest of the car. On a cool foggy (summer) San Francisco day.
customer_reviews.author: 8b63vI4aSp88ZVq32a2qFs3wOutHO6

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty much pink water. I followed the instructions. Sprayed it on waited 5 minutes and rinsed. It removed nothing. Not one speck. So I tried it a second time with a sponge as they suggested. Same thing no brake dust removed. I then then tried it a third time with scrubbing with a course scrub pad. Nothing !! I then used a magic eraser and everything came off. Don’t waste your money !
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Rafes

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Instructions say to leave this on for 3-5 minutes. However, it dries within a minute or so. I do live in Texas but it wasn't too hot and the wheel was cool to the touch, kind of disappointing. It also doesn't spray too well, instead it kind of just shoots the cleaner in a stream so you can't get an even coating on. Also the bottle is thin and wimpy so it falls over constantly when going wheel to wheel cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson America

customer_reviews.title: LEGIT
customer_reviews.text: Wow I’m left speechless! I’ve been guilty of never washing my car for months at a time, let alone washing the rims. After trying to scrub them out with basic car wash soap, I decided to look up different rim cleaners then found this amazing product. Just follow the instructions to the T, it’s super simple. If you don’t have high pressure water or even a hose to reach, just a bucket of clean water to pour over the scrubbed rim will do. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: 808mikeel808

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of other reviewers, I was blown away at how well the product worked. I just used it on a Merc GLA with about two months of brake dust and it was like I had a brand new wheel (minus the curb marks). Also used it on a Porsche Panamera with caked on Brake Dust. Removed all the dust where spritz with little effort. Did need to use more than one spritz on the caked areas, but for the most part, my wheels shined. If it's nature safe as advertised, this product is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Aldrich J. Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Performance!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner works incredibly well on both tires and rims! Just a few sprays per wheel, let it soak for a few minutes, and then wash it down. I prefer to agitate the dirt and brake dust with a wheel brush after using the spray and then washing it down; this is sort of critical if you plan on using a tire shine spray as a follow-up for a longer lasting and deeper shine. I HIGHLY recommend this product for the price! You also really don't need to go crazy with the spray, so it will definitely last longer whilst still being very effective!
customer_reviews.author: Usman Khan

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great on my OEM wheels
customer_reviews.text: This works amazing, I just bought an Acura TSX 2010 and the wheels (Alluminum) were a mess, Sprayed a coat on waited for 5 minutes, I decided to use my Wheel brush as well. The wheels after one rinse looked amazing!!! They were super shiny I highly recommend this product, Definitely worth the money, and will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work all that well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the good reviews...but was a bit disappointed when I used it for myself. I does get the top layer of dirt off the wheel...but I still have to clean by hand what the spray does not. If have to get down and clean the wheels by hand...why use the spray in the first place? Poorboys wheel cleaner works way better. You spray on and rinse...no need to go a second round by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Getter

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel cleaner I've used
customer_reviews.text: Hadn't washed the car in something like 6 months due to constant rain. Wheels were almost black. Sprayed some on, let it sit for a few minutes, hit it with a brush and hosed it off. Wheels came out looking brand new and it took half the time of using soap and water and didn't work up a sweat. Great product, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Holger B

customer_reviews.title: Worst wheel cleaner I have ever used...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff couldn't clean brake dust off of Teflon. Its so bad that after the first use I had to double check the bottle to make sure Amazon sent me wheel cleaner. It does absolutely nothing on German car brake dust. I would love to be able to return this and get my money back as this stuff is no stronger than regular soap and water. Its horrible, it really is.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal M

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. I applied to my winter wheels that had been severely neglected and covered in brake dust/dirt for over 6 months in the garage. Can't expect miracles, but the dirt washed off with ease when using this product and a soft wheel brush to dislodge some of the baked on grime. Wheels look as good as new now. I applied CarGuys Hybrid wax to my clean wheels and now the dirt actually falls off when using this product and just a hose down. I also used it to clean my Cobb exhaust tips, and it worked really well. No more scrubbing with vinegar! It also has a nice refreshing smell.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Very clean rims but hard to spray.
customer_reviews.text: It cleaned my rims very nicely but the only thing I don't like is it shoots out a stream of gel instead of a mist. If it was a mist it would make it easy to apply to the rim but the stream you have to be more precise. Anyways it cleans the rims really well just have to spray as much as you can without wasting and (cross promo) use a nice (one of their) cleaning brush!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on this brand not knowing anyone who has used it, but went with the reviews and dove in. What I noticed first was how thick this stuff is. So thick that it sticks to the wheel without slopping off and dripping all over the place. Let it sit on the wheel for a few minutes and did not even scrub. Sparkle clean after spraying off, so I would say works great. A little more expensive than similar products I normally purchase, but works well. Took off dirt, and brake dust.
customer_reviews.author: Hokie115

customer_reviews.title: This product is excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't leave reviews but I've almost every wheel cleaner on the market (Sonax, Meguiars, Nextzett, Griot's, CarPro, etc.) and this product is fantastic. It works immediately. Sorry I have no pics but I decided to give it a try and test it on a rim and tire that hadn't been washed in 4 months. And I was blown away. The dirt comes off instant. Rim and tire look brand new after some light agitation. Product clings great. Seems really high quality. I'm impressed. I will be buying a gallon.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Car Guys Wheel & Tire Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Car Guys Wheel & Tire Cleaner, worked ok, not terrible and not great. It does not clean the rims or calibers very well without brushing. My Audi S6 rims does come clean just by spraying the cleaner on the rims and going through a car wash. I wash my car and rims once or twice a week and drive about 100 miles between washes, so the brake dust does not get baked on.
customer_reviews.author: Stcap

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I tried Car Guys Wheel and Tire Cleaner and it doesn't work as advertised. To actually get the wheels clean you still have to use a wash mitt and brushes to remove all the brake dust. If I have to wash the wheels by hand what good is their product? This was purchased to make it easier to clean the wheels but it adds another step and expense. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Average

customer_reviews.title: Great tire cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, cleaned up my tires and wheel like you wouldnʻt believe - dirt just came flying off! The only think about it is I seem to use too much to clean each tire. Perhaps Iʻm overspraying but to me it would appear the cost of repurchasing this would be prohibitive over the long haul. I do like it a lot but unless I can manage the amount I use per tire - I will probably look for alternatives...
customer_reviews.author: HI_flier

customer_reviews.title: McGuires Chrome less expensive does better job on very dirty chrome wheels
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading the many reviews of many products. Granted my tires hadn’t been really cleaned in more than a month but I applied and scrubbed twice with this product. Followed directions about leaving it on for five minutes. Was not satisfied and used McGuires Chrome wheel cleaner for a third wash and the chrome rim looked great. Used just McGuires on other front rim and no waiting longer than 30 seconds. Scrubbed and rinsed and just as good as other rim in one wash. To be fair on back rims both products did a great job on one wash and scrub and rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Marienstadt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked amazingly well. It took years of brake dust off after soaking a couple of minutes. My wheels were in definite need of some tlc. I'm pretty sure the previous owners had never heard of a wheel brush or wheel cleaner for that matter. My wheels aren't back to factory yet but unless CarGuys has figured out how to work miracles there isn't much else they can do for them. Also, I appreciate that it didn't smell like oven cleaner. Some wheel cleaners out there should come with a complimentary respirator to use them. I will definitely be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: RobertB

customer_reviews.title: Takes off months of brake dust.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. Second time buying it. I've had others that claim to clean everything, but I always have to respray and do it again. Nobody likes working double. A little does go a long way, but make sure you use some water and a good brush to get it working. Try to use on a cool day so it won't dry on the wheels. It tends to get harder to scrub off once it does. I use it on all my cars and it is a powerhouse. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Brake Dust Pro is better..
customer_reviews.text: I've always used Brake Dust Pro ~ $30 a bottle, but grew tired of spending so much money. After seeing the reviews, I thought I'd give it a try. The results were horrible and ruined my dipped rims. I followed the directions closely, did NOT allow it to sit for more than 5 minutes nor in directly sunlight. This is the second Car Guys product I bought and have been dissatisfied with. I'll stick to what works, even if it's twice the price.

customer_reviews.title: Only one needed!
customer_reviews.text: Works better than any other tire/rim cleaner I have ever used. And most importantly, it is safe on all rim surfaces. My rims, like most, have a clear coat finish over them. Nothing looks worse than when they start to peel. That is from using a harsh cleaners with acids or alkalines. This will not harm your rim, and its finish. This is the only tire/rim cleaner you will ever need
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sims

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd try just spraying it on some lightly dusty wheels and hose it off without touching them and I would say it had no effect at all. They where just as dirty after the application which means you have to use a brush or cleaning cloth to agitate the product to have any results at all. Simple Green achieves the same results for a 1/4 of the price. In fact just wiping them down with a wet cloth removes most of the road grime with just water so it seems I wasted $17.00...
customer_reviews.author: Ed in NH

customer_reviews.title: As advertised....
customer_reviews.text: I just followed the directions and it worked wonderfully. Normal washing didn't get the brake dust off the rims and after washing the vehicle, I sprayed this on and rinsed it off after leaving it on for the specified time frame. I watched the dirt and grime come off. A little pricey, but it worked like it said it would. Cheaper in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well but don't expect it to magically take away brake dust without some wiping/scrubbing. Compared to any other wheel cleaner I've used the smell is outstanding. Not saying I'd want an air freshener in this scent but at least it doesn't smell like carcinogenic chemicals. I have to drive 4 minutes to a car wash since there's no faucet out front of my townhouse complex. I have to spray down my wheels with water and wait a few minutes til they are cooler before I apply.
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed how poorly it performed.
customer_reviews.text: Are we really talking about the same product? how did this product get a 4+ stars rating? Total waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: SSR

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! I have powder coated rims that I literally haven't cleaned in 3 years besides going to the carwash but as you know that doesn't clean your rims good at all. This stuff took off every single bit of brake dust without leaving streaks or staining on the powder coating. I've used other sprays that have left permanent stains in the powder coating. I will never use anything else but this for my rims from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Squeaky Squid

customer_reviews.title: No where near what they advertise
customer_reviews.text: This product does nothing more than what a $3 bottle at Wal-Mart will do. No I have a $49 bottle of non-returnable product. Normally these Car Guys produce good products but this one is a swing and a miss. You still have to use a sponge to clean the wheels. Lesson learned. Don’t read the hype. Spend your money on a less expensive produ t
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously never thought I'd write a review but it does what it says it'll do. I have an SUV and it has the company logo on the tires and I after washing the car a few times the white of the writing was still dull and kinda dirty looking. I looked around online for something strong to clean but safe for the rims and after using this product once the tires are clean as if they were new and the "BF Goodrich" logo is as white as it should be. the rims had a little brake residue on them and this did remove the little I had and the brought back a nice shine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Works great on the outside facing rim, not so much the inner rim
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works good on the outside facing surface of the rim not so much the inside. I tried multiple times to spray inside the rim and even let it soak, but there where still deposits on the inside rim. I will probably just invest in a thin brush to fully clean the inside part of the rim. One thing great about this product is you just spray, wait a couple minutes and use a brush afterward to get off the grime. Rinse and viola a nice looking clean rim. In addition the price is a bit steep for this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Madrigal

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my son's Accord Wheels. I don't believe he has cleaned them in two years. This product worked great. Sprayed the wheel let it sit for 3 minutes and scrubbed with a brush with very little effort. Only regret is that I didn't take a before after picture. These wheels were almost black and now they look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: MAZ

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel cleaner I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's the best wheel cleaner I've ever used. Applied to wheels with over a months worth of grime and brake dust, sprayed on, waited 3 minutes then sprayed off with just the pressure of a garden hose nozzle. The results were fantastic, couldn't believe it, with no scrubbing it all just washed away and that was from wheels that were really dirty to start with! Cuts car wash time down significantly for those that have rims that need a lot of hand held brush work.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S

customer_reviews.title: Very effective cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I never really had much need to clean my car wheel hubcaps until I moved to a big city. I tried cleaning all the grime off without any kind of cleaning agent and a brush, it was a challenge to remove even a little bit of the built up gunk. I sprayed some of this on my hubcaps and I basically could wipe it off with ease at that point. It is very effective. My advice is not to let it sit for more than a couple minutes on a hot summer day.
customer_reviews.author: Techjunkie87

customer_reviews.title: WOW.  Just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I've used a lot of cleaners over the years and this stuff is amazing. A little goes a long way and it's a thick gel that sticks in place to work. It hasn't damaged any of the wheels I've used it on and made some old rims on my truck that haven't been washed in over a year look almost new! Worth the price and I'll be ordering more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Southbound

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and use something else
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed with this product. Way over priced for what it does. There was a lot of grime left on the wheels even after scrubbing them. I had to spray and scrub them a second time to get most of it off. By then, most of the contents of the bottle was used. I could have achieve similar results with Simple Green soapy water. I am not buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so amazed in this product, i used it on a 08’ Highlander and it was the most brilliant shine I’ve seen on that SUV. The best part was that the water beading off the vehicle lasted through 4 washes and still going strong! It was easy to apply and polish off. I plan on applying it again after next wash to protected through Canadian winter weather!
customer_reviews.author: ewei

customer_reviews.title: Know what you are buying
customer_reviews.text: I’m a newcomer to this type product, used by a presser washer. So I will say this. 2 minutes wait time before rinsing is not enough. Plenty of foaming action, just no poof, it’s gone. It’s not. If I have to brush my mags, I might as well just wash them.
customer_reviews.author: TurnKey23

customer_reviews.title: Melt away unsightly grime and shine
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the instructions provided by the manufacturer, cleaning is easy-peasy. I was amazed how 17 years of grime and grease melted away from the lug nuts and recesses around them from my alloy rims on my old Subaru Forester and my wife's new Forester's fancy custom rims as well. If you are serious about cleaning and detailing, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Indulis Kalnins

customer_reviews.title: WARNING Does NOT work on ALL plastidip products
customer_reviews.text: This wheel cleaner works well for getting break dust and dirt out, HOWEVER it does not work on ALL plastidip!! My wheels have 5 base coats of black and 3 coats of gray anthracite pearl metalizer. I sprayed each wheal lightly with the cleaner, waited 5 min, then with low water pressure rinsed the wheels and the pearl metalizers came off!!! As you can see from the pictures only the pearl metalizer washed off at parts of the wheel but the Black plastidip base coat was still intact.
customer_reviews.author: WookieCookiess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I used it to clean the wheels on my Ferrari F430 Spider. The wheels were heavily coated with brake dust. I wanted to try the wheel cleaner without scrubbing my wheels to see how effective it is and I was amazed. I let the wheel cleaner sit on my wheels for about 5 minutes then I hosed it off and my wheels came out super clean. Great product, highly recommended. I will try and add photos later.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L.

customer_reviews.title: Non Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned brake dust off some used rims I purchased w/ CLR. Since All the dust wasn't removed I ordered this product. I followed the instructions; the results were disappointing. I couldn't see that any additional brake dust had been removed. Note: Rims were heavily covered. It's possible this product works on light brake dust removal.
customer_reviews.author: G. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good wheel cleaner, I tried it on 3 different sets of wheels and the results were outstanding. Just spray it on, let it sit a couple of minutes, agitate lightly with soft brush and rinse off.
customer_reviews.author: gerard a.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect, but reading the reviews gave me high hopes for this product. The difference is completely night and day. My tires haven't been cleaned in years, so this kind of restoration is pretty good considering the build up of dirt and rust. I'm not sure if I was being excessive with spraying the cleaning solution, but I feel like this could clean at most 3 sets of tires??? The point is I wish the bottle was bigger because I actually like this product. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on stock polished wheels!
customer_reviews.text: I guess this stuff may work on painted wheels or plastic hub caps, but it does not work on stock Chrysler polished aluminum wheels. I used a Mother's soft brush on each wheel for a few minutes and this is how the wheels turned out. Very disappointed with this product. Fortunately Amazon has a good return policy and I'll try something different. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: Prime customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Really cleaned up everything. I would suggest Waterdown down the wheels. Spray on your wheels let sit for two to three minutes. Then with a cleaning microfiber hand car scrubber scrub off. All grunge / oil / brake dust lift off easy. Then rinse off
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Last year I bought a 10 year old car that I don't believe was ever washed. The wheels had a buildup of caked on brake dust that I couldn't remove. I tried 4 other products that just didn't cut it. The process requires some scrubbing with a bristle brush but it removes brake dust. Looking forward to pulling the wheels off and really going at it!
customer_reviews.author: Donald H Lloyd Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I like that I went on a whim to try this product. I always bought whatever was available at my local grocery store in the car section. I ran across this item & I was really impressed how well it performed with minimal effort. Definitely would buy again, I love my chrome wheels clean & shiny! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Clean but streaky
customer_reviews.text: I have black matte rims and this product wasn't any better than plain soap and water. Rims still spotty and streaked when looking at them in the sun
customer_reviews.author: dbackfan

customer_reviews.title: No better than regular soap and water
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work any better than soap and water. Sprayed it on and followed directions and still had to get down with a microfiber cloth to get the dust off my black power coated wheels on my corvette. Save your money and just use regular soap and water or try a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Digger

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Updated: The previous sprayer that I ordered had some problems with nozzle so it was spraying product not right. The supplier reached out to me and send another one right away And it worked perfectly fine Reall Good customer care And the product is good as well Worth spending the money
customer_reviews.author: Mgk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wheel cleaner for the price and doubles as a tire cleaner to boot
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Works very well even against better known products like P21S wheel cleaner which is pricey. Cuts through grease and grime with little effort and its like getting 2 products in one cause you can use on tires as well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kanada

customer_reviews.title: Do not use on General Grabber Red Letters
customer_reviews.text: Do not use on General Grabber Red Letters. Some of my tires red lettering had faded and based on the whitewall cleaning stated, I tried to remove the fading. The cleaner did not help, but actually removed more of the color. As for the cleaning of the wheels it worked fine, nothing overly special.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel cleaner you will ever find!
customer_reviews.text: Without doubt the best cleaner I have ever bought. I had baked on brake dust that no chemical or cleaner would begin to remove. These guys product cut through the residue effortlessly. I need no other wheel cleaner than this! Great seller communication, great product, I highly recommend buying these guys products.
customer_reviews.author: Sperry Lover

customer_reviews.title: The best wheel cleaner!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used three different cleaners and this one by far is the best. Used it on my motorcycle wheels to clean road gunk it was truly awesome. All other product just didn’t work. Follow the instructions and let it sit for 3-4min. A little scrub and my wheels looks super clean.
customer_reviews.author: zx10r

customer_reviews.title: decent cleaner on old wheels
customer_reviews.text: 2001 Ford f250 wheels. The wheels haven't been cleaned in about 10 years. The truck has been sitting. used this product, let it sit 5 mins, used a nylon drill brush to agitate. rinsed clean. see picture for results. Wheels are much cleaner. Did not remove white corrosion/oxidation spots. did not remove sports where old wheel weights were. However, did a great job cleaning the rest of the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: TVM

customer_reviews.title: GET IT
customer_reviews.text: i like this product it worked immediately, be aware you may have to use more than once if wheels are very yellow / gold make sure to follow instructions price is fair compared to market GET IT
customer_reviews.author: Don C

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a an excellent product and easy to use. Just spray your (cool to the touch) wheels with water, spray the product on the each entire wheel surface, let sit for 3-5 minutes, lightly agitate the wheels with a brush or sponge and spray off thoroughly with a high powered stream of water. Dry the wheels thoroughly right away to avoid water spots. Your wheels will look great!
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Good wheel cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This wheel cleaner is quite good. You still have to wipe the wheels down, but everything comes off easily without scrubbing. Interestingly, I swear it helps repell brake dust later. I've used it a few times now and the wheels have been less dirty and easier to clean each time. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Brook Ray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the results of this product, however, for the price will not be purchasing again as other cleaners can be used with similar results at 1/3-1/2 the price. I found that I only get 4-5 washes from this product whereas a cheaper alternative might get me 3-4 washes for significantly less money.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett C.

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I used this stuff on my brake dust covered tires and it worked great. Spray on, massage with a brush, let sit for a few minutes, rinse and brush off the residue. Presto, clean tires. It took two applications to get everything clean but it was far easier than scrubbing with regular soap.
customer_reviews.author: Sobakasu

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used this on the wheels of my truck and it left them sparkling. Sprays on easy. I used a drill powered brush to remove the grime and break dust from the wheels and it all came off with ease. Simply sprayed down the wheels with water at the end and it looked great.
customer_reviews.author: pianoman16

customer_reviews.title: Safest Wheel Cleaner Out There
customer_reviews.text: On par with a lot of the bigger names. Requires a little more agitation with a wheel brush than some of the harsher wheel cleaners but definitely less than a lot of the junk at Walmart & Autozone. A lot of the harsher wheel cleaners can harm your wheel paint or clear coat if you leave any on, this one has not from my experience. I have used a lot of different brands and while I use Adam's Polishes or Chemical Guys for some of our cars, I only use this particular one for our cars above $100,000. This one is just safer and less harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprising.
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought this product was damaging my black painted rims. Shortly after, I realized it was bringing the years of yellow clay dirt and grime out of the wheel and up to the surface. If your wheels were as dirty as mine, it will take several cycles of cleaning before they're finally clean. I respect that because I don't want a stronger product to damage my wheels. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised that people like the product
customer_reviews.text: Overall Car Guy products are pretty decent but the Wheel and Tire cleaner is absolutely NOT worth the money. I did one rim with Car Guys and another rim with Mequiars Ultimate cleaner (side by side) and it was amazing at how much stronger Mequiars was. When using Mequairs you are able to get the bulk of the brake dust off without scrubbing but the Car Guys cleaner you minus well use a bucket of plain soap and water. They must be paying for good reviews... very disappointing. I am only giving the Car Guys wheel cleaner 2 stars due to the quality of their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Malle

customer_reviews.title: Does not do a good job of cleaning your wheels!
customer_reviews.text: I have done everything as instructed on the back of the bottle and this wheel cleaner is not working. I just bought my rims a month ago and they are not that dirty, but this cleaner does not do what it states: clean. If you are looking for a good wheel cleaner then skip this one. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: G. Olivares

customer_reviews.title: Not great on very dirt wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product on regular brake dust I'm assuming. I used it on very dirty tires and wheels, with somewhat poor results. It is relatively expensive and I'm not sure if it works well enough to justify the cost, if you are in dirtier than normal conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this if your rims are painted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product excited to use it after washing reviews of this online. As soon as I receive it in the mail I followed the instructions and was hopeful for the results I was seeing online. After using it I had to return it because it ruined my wheels. I had to repaint my wheels because this product begin to peel off the paint on my wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wheel cleaner!!
customer_reviews.text: It works amazing on my chrome wheels that hadn’t been cleaned in years!! Definitely exceeded my expectations!! No harsh chemical smell, will not hurt paint. Best to agitate to get even better shine!! I recommend the polisher they sell that hooks to drill, in my opinion was way better than the Mother’s polisher I had
customer_reviews.author: Jonyardbird

customer_reviews.title: Simply the BEST Wheel Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to apply and I just followed the simple directions (so easy to use) and "Voila" I had wheels that looked brand new. No hard scrubbing, no messy residue...just easy and effective. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: stevespassion

customer_reviews.title: Deep clean brake dust
customer_reviews.text: This definitely helps with deep cleaning. I tried to clean my wheels (I don't remember last time I cleaned it maybe 2 years?). I used a brush to help the cleaning since it was so long but after rinsing a few times till there were no bubbles, I saw the new shiny silver where I brushed and the browns of brake dust where I couldn't brush. This product definitely works. Just don't expect it to deep clean a year of dust without brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Wheel and Tire Cleaner - Safe for all Wheels and Rims - Works on Alloy Chrome Aluminum Clear-Coated Painted Polished and Plasti-Dipped Rim - Wheel Cleaner by CarGuys
product_meta.description:
Size:18 Ounces

Do you need something to quickly and effectively clean your wheels?

Are you tired of looking through pages of wheel cleaners, hoping to find a product that is safe for the wheels on your vehicle??

STOP! Your search is over!


- This is SAFE for ALL types of WHEELS and TIRES on the market!

- Super concentrated gel reduces the amount of product needed! Saving you $$$ in the long run!

- Clings to wheels giving minimal runoff for MAXIMUM cleaning power!

- Safe on high end braking systems, calipers and exhaust tips!


Don’t fall for the “acid free” color changing gimmick going around... Have you smelled that stuff?!?
*Warning* labels that say to avoid skin contact?! Don’t be fooled anymore!
This has been specially formulated to be pH balanced.
It will safely remove the toughest iron particles, brake dust and road grime on any wheel or tire!

With over 800+ five star reviews, Amazon customers agree, this is THE BEST WHEEL CLEANER available today!!

This product is currently in high demand, our supplies are extremely limited.Buy Now! Exclusively available only on Amazon.com!
feature_bullets: CLEANS AWAY HARMFUL SALT AND WINTER GRIME - Most people dont know how corrosive road salts are to their vehicles. Salt will eat away at your wheels, damage protective clear coats, and quickly create rust spots. CarGuys Premium Wheel Cleaner will safely and effectively wash it all away!

ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY Do you know why over the counter products are so CHEAP!? Because they use DIRTY and CHEAP chemicals that are harmful to the environment. All of our products are made in the USA by hard working Americans and conform to all safety regulations. This has been specially formulated to be Acid Free, Non-Toxic, and pH balanced. You can be sure that our products are safe!

SAFE ON EVERY WHEEL OR TIRE Will NOT damage or stain your wheels. It WILL clean any and every kind of wheel or tire that you can put on your vehicle. Alloy, Aluminum, Anodized, Chrome, Painted, Polished, Clear-coated and Plasti-Dipped Rims! If its not on this list, the answer is yes, it will work!

BRIGHTEN & CLEAN WHITE WALL TIRES MOTORCYCLE SAFE This cleaner has a use for everything! Do you have a classic car with beautiful white-wall tires? Are you looking for a motorcycle wheel cleaner? This product is for you!
100% SATISFACTION MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - No fine printing to read, no gimmicks. Get in contact with us to see what great customer service feels like!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,216 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
